response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product not only meets but exceeds industry standards, offering unparalleled performance and durability. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $15,000. Considering its high value and the potential it holds for enhancing your operations or personal needs, I would like to extend this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is valid for a limited time, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal.", "product_price": 14000}
